description: Inspired by the grandeur of Greek mythology, Tech Olympus blends ancient myths with modern technology to showcase the timeless power of innovation. Drawing from the legendary pantheon of 12 Greek gods, this year's theme highlights Zeus as the central figure, with each of the other 11 gods representing unique events that celebrate various aspects of technology and computer science.

Participants will embark on an epic journey through workshops, competitions, and discussions, exploring how classical mythology intertwines with cutting-edge advancements in the digital realm. Gateways 2024 invites students and tech enthusiasts nationwide to ascend Mount Olympus, unlocking the divine potential of technology and human ingenuity.
